headline: Northrop Grumman to Participate in the 13th Annual Morgan Stanley Laguna Conference
summary: FALLS CHURCH, Va., Sept. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE: NOC) will participate in the 13th Annual Morgan Stanley Laguna Conference on Thursday, September 11. Kathy Warden, chair, chief executive officer and president, will present beginning at 12:15 p.m. Eastern time. The presentation will be webcast live at http://investor.northropgrumman.com. Northrop Grumman is a leading global aerospace and defense technology company. Our pioneering solutions equip our custom
